snippet.title: TOUCHSTARVED | a gothic horror romance visual novel
snippet.description:
Play TOUCHSTARVED Demo ✦ https://www.redspring.studio/play 
Wishlist TOUCHSTARVED on Steam ✦ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2185510/TOUCHSTARVED/
﻿
TOUCHSTARVED Official Trailer ✦  Kickstarter
You were born cursed, with hands that twist the mind of any human you touch. 
Desperation leads you to the shadowy city of Eridia, where your fate intertwines with 5 monstrous strangers. Each can offer you salvation…or damnation. 
How far will you go to cure yourself?
﻿
TOUCHSTARVED is a gothic horror romance visual novel and debut game from Red Spring Studio, a small indie games team made up of veteran game developers from Riot Games, Nix Hydra, Bungie, and more. We are currently crowdfunding for Steam release on PC and Mac until April 20th, 2023. If you're a fan of romance, monsters, otome games, dating sims, interactive fiction, or visual novels, consider supporting us! https://www.redspring.studio/Kickstarter
﻿
WEBSITE ✦ https://www.redspring.studio/
TWITTER ✦ https://www.twitter.com/redspringstudio
INSTAGRAM ✦ https://www.instagram.com/redspringstudio
﻿
Animation by Knights of the Light Table ✦ https://knightsofthelighttable.com/
Director ✦ Patrick Stannard
Supervising Animator ✦ Abroo Khan
Animation and Clean Up ✦ Kaya Horiya, Imogen Osborne-Sobers
Background Illustration ✦ Sean Randolph
Music ✦ Every Time We Touch (ft. Dan Avidan) ✦ Cover arranged by Jesse Cale 
﻿Editing ✦ val. https://twitter.com/Alchiet

#TOUCHSTARVEDgame #visualnovel  #indiegame
